name: Schrodinger Hunter
description:
Face the invasion of mutant cats as the scientist that got caught in the crossfire and save the world in this hard and punishing action-platformer.

- 1~2 hour campaign with a straight journey from the lab that started it all to the cats base of operation.

- Big variety of weird and grotesque cat mutations with different movement patterns.

- Difficult yet learnable bosses that will put your reflexes to the limit.

- Schrodinger cats have a 50% chance of regenerating from a critical state!
